docs.lead_paragraph: Problems with radiation overdoses during CT brain perfusion scans became apparent in 2009, leading to an investigation by the Food and Drug Administration. Despite repeated warnings by the F.D.A., patients at Cabell Huntington Hospital in West Virginia continued to received elevated levels of radiation.
